alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY AND NORTH CENTRAL HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM CDT... At 800 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Bush Intercontinental Airport, or near Humble, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Humble, Aldine, Northside / Northline, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, northwestern Greater Heights, northwestern Memorial Park, Near Northside Houston, Kingwood, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Spring Branch East, Eastex / Jensen Area, Central Northwest, Fairbanks / Northwest Crossing, Langwood, Willowbrook, Hidden Valley, Acres Home, Independence Heights, and Greater Inwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
